name: Guardian Media Group
goal: To produce liberal journalism that embodies our core values of openness, honesty, integrity, courage, and fairness.
interests: Communication, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives: Ensuring proportion privacy proposals, maintaining freedom of expression and strong media plurality frameworks to ensure a diverse, unfettered availability of news across member states, and challenging existing and emerging monopolies in the media.
